text: Red Lund is a pioneering American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), p.180. Driving a Ford-powered 1932 Ford, he won NHRA's first- ever B/SR (B Street) championship, at Great Bend, Kansas, in 1955.Davis, p.180. His winning speed was .Davis, p.180. (His elapsed time was not recorded or has not been preserved.) He won no other NHRA national gasser championships.Davis, p.180-6. ==Notes== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. 'Gasser Wars, North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, p.180-6. Category:Dragster drivers
title: Red Lund
